scripts.postinstall: node makeEngine.js && spago install && spago build
scripts.start: node makeEngine.js && spago install && spago build && webpack serve --mode=development --open
scripts.start:gitpod: node makeEngine.js && webpack serve --mode=development --open --public "$(gp url 8080 | sed 's+https://++'):443"
scripts.ide: wget https://meeshkan-public-assets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/wags/language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && wget https://meeshkan-public-assets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/wags/ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix && code --install-extension language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && code --install-extension ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix && rm language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && rm ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix
scripts.ide:gitpod: wget https://meeshkan-public-assets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/wags/language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && wget https://meeshkan-public-assets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/wags/ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix && code --install-extension /workspace/wagsi/language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && code --install-extension /workspace/wagsi/ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix && rm language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && rm ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix
scripts.ide:codespaces: wget https://meeshkan-public-assets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/wags/language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && wget https://meeshkan-public-assets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/wags/ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix && code --install-extension /workspaces/wagsi/language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && code --install-extension /workspaces/wagsi/ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix && rm language-purescript-0.2.5.vsix && rm ide-purescript-0.25.0.vsix
